questions.question: What about the error handling for INVALID KEY on REWRITE ACCOUNT-FILE at line 556, which sets fail reason 109 but does not abend or prevent subsequent WRITE to TRANSACT-FILE at line 564? Is there a business rule for continuing posting despite update failure?
In data_flow.reads_from[0].fields_used for DALYTRAN-AMT, citation lists 436, but line 436 moves DALYTRAN-ORIG-TS; AMT is first computed with at 403-405 and moved at 430. Is the citation accurate?

In data_flow.writes_to[0] for TRANSACT-FILE, fields_written lists only TRAN-ID, TRAN-AMT, TRAN-PROC-TS (citations 425,430,438), but lines 425-436 move additional fields like TRAN-TYPE-CD, TRAN-CAT-CD, TRAN-SOURCE, TRAN-DESC, TRAN-MERCHANT-ID, TRAN-MERCHANT-NAME, TRAN-MERCHANT-CITY, TRAN-MERCHANT-ZIP, TRAN-CARD-NUM, TRAN-ORIG-TS. Why are these omitted?

The paragraphs section documents major open/read/post/reject/abend paragraphs but omits close paragraphs (e.g., 9000-DALYTRAN-CLOSE at 582) and sub-paragraphs like 2700-UPDATE-TCATBAL (467), 2700-A-CREATE-TCATBAL-REC (503), 2800-UPDATE-ACCOUNT-REC (545). Necessary for completeness?

In error_handling citations for closes include 650 (PERFORM 9910 in DALYREJS-CLOSE), but line 649 moves XREFFILE-STATUS to IO-STATUS instead of DALYREJS-STATUS. Does the documentation reflect this code discrepancy?

What about the handling for INVALID KEY on REWRITE ACCOUNT-FILE at line 556, which sets WS-VALIDATION-FAIL-REASON to 109 but does not abend, reject, or prevent the subsequent WRITE to TRANSACT-FILE at line 564 or updates to TCATBAL? Is there a business rule for posting transactions despite account update failure?

Lines 436 MOVE DALYTRAN-ORIG-TS TO TRAN-ORIG-TS and 438 MOVE DB2-FORMAT-TS (new current timestamp from lines 692-704) TO TRAN-PROC-TS, but data_flow.transforms[0] describes transformation from DALYTRAN-ORIG-TS to TRAN-PROC-TS as 'Copy orig-ts; overwrite with current'. Does this accurately reflect that TRAN-ORIG-TS receives the input orig-ts copy while TRAN-PROC-TS gets a new timestamp?

In error_handling for closes, citation 650 refers to PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS in 9300-DALYREJS-CLOSE, but line 649 moves XREFFILE-STATUS (not DALYREJS-STATUS) to IO-STATUS before the perform. Does the documentation account for this code discrepancy?

What about the close paragraphs such as 9000-DALYTRAN-CLOSE at line 582, 9100-TRANFILE-CLOSE at 600, and sub-paragraphs like 2700-A-CREATE-TCATBAL-REC at 503 and 2700-B-UPDATE-TCATBAL-REC at 526? Are these omitted from paragraphs section intentionally, or needed for completeness?

In data_flow.writes_to[0] for TRANSACT-FILE, fields_written lists only TRAN-ID, TRAN-TYPE-CD, TRAN-CAT-CD, TRAN-AMT, TRAN-PROC-TS with citations 425,430,438, but lines 426-436 MOVE additional fields like TRAN-SOURCE, TRAN-DESC, TRAN-MERCHANT-ID, TRAN-MERCHANT-NAME, TRAN-MERCHANT-CITY, TRAN-MERCHANT-ZIP, TRAN-CARD-NUM, TRAN-ORIG-TS. Why are these omitted?
